targets.queryText:
SELECT
  time,
  (LEAD(bytes) OVER(ORDER BY time) - bytes) / (LEAD(time) OVER(ORDER BY time) - time) as Bandwidth
FROM (
  SELECT 
    timestamp / 1000000 as time,
    extra_data->>"$.decoder.bytes" as bytes
  FROM "other-event"
  WHERE
    event_type = "stats"
    AND time >= $__from / 1000 and time < $__to / 1000
)

targets.queryText:
SELECT
  time,
  (LEAD(decoder_tcp) OVER(ORDER BY time) - decoder_tcp) / (LEAD(time) OVER(ORDER BY time) - time) as TCP,
  (LEAD(decoder_udp) OVER(ORDER BY time) - decoder_udp) / (LEAD(time) OVER(ORDER BY time) - time) as UDP,
  (LEAD(decoder_icmpv4) OVER(ORDER BY time) - decoder_icmpv4) / (LEAD(time) OVER(ORDER BY time) - time) as ICMPv4,
  (LEAD(decoder_icmpv6) OVER(ORDER BY time) - decoder_icmpv6) / (LEAD(time) OVER(ORDER BY time) - time) as ICMPv6
FROM (
  SELECT 
    timestamp / 1000000 as time,
    extra_data->>"$.decoder.tcp" as decoder_tcp,
    extra_data->>"$.decoder.udp" as decoder_udp,
    extra_data->>"$.decoder.icmpv4" as decoder_icmpv4,
    extra_data->>"$.decoder.icmpv6" as decoder_icmpv6
  FROM "other-event"
  WHERE
    event_type = "stats"
    AND time >= $__from / 1000 and time < $__to / 1000
)

SELECT
  time,
  (LEAD(state_new) OVER(ORDER BY time) - state_new) / (LEAD(time) OVER(ORDER BY time) - time) as New,
  (LEAD(state_established) OVER(ORDER BY time) - state_established) / (LEAD(time) OVER(ORDER BY time) - time) as Established,
  (LEAD(state_closed) OVER(ORDER BY time) - state_closed) / (LEAD(time) OVER(ORDER BY time) - time) as Closed
FROM (
  SELECT
    timestamp / 1000000 as time,
    extra_data->>"$.flow.end.state.new" as state_new,
    extra_data->>"$.flow.end.state.established" as state_established,
    extra_data->>"$.flow.end.state.closed" as state_closed
  FROM "other-event"
  WHERE
    event_type = "stats"
    AND time >= $__from / 1000 and time < $__to / 1000
)

targets.queryText:
SELECT
  time,
  (LEAD(flow_failed_tcp) OVER(ORDER BY time) - flow_failed_tcp) / (LEAD(time) OVER(ORDER BY time) - time) as "Raw / Failed TCP",
  (LEAD(flow_http) OVER(ORDER BY time) - flow_http) / (LEAD(time) OVER(ORDER BY time) - time) as HTTP,
  (LEAD(flow_ftp) OVER(ORDER BY time) - flow_ftp) / (LEAD(time) OVER(ORDER BY time) - time) as FTP,
  (LEAD(flow_smtp) OVER(ORDER BY time) - flow_smtp) / (LEAD(time) OVER(ORDER BY time) - time) as SMTP,
  (LEAD(flow_tls) OVER(ORDER BY time) - flow_tls) / (LEAD(time) OVER(ORDER BY time) - time) as TLS,
  (LEAD(flow_ssh) OVER(ORDER BY time) - flow_ssh) / (LEAD(time) OVER(ORDER BY time) - time) as SSH,
  (LEAD(flow_imap) OVER(ORDER BY time) - flow_imap) / (LEAD(time) OVER(ORDER BY time) - time) as IMAP,
  (LEAD(flow_smb) OVER(ORDER BY time) - flow_smb) / (LEAD(time) OVER(ORDER BY time) - time) as Samba,
  (LEAD(flow_dcerpc_tcp) OVER(ORDER BY time) - flow_dcerpc_tcp) / (LEAD(time) OVER(ORDER BY time) - time) as "DCERPC TCP",
  (LEAD(flow_dns_tcp) OVER(ORDER BY time) - flow_dns_tcp) / (LEAD(time) OVER(ORDER BY time) - time) as "DNS TCP",
  (LEAD(flow_modbus) OVER(ORDER BY time) - flow_modbus) / (LEAD(time) OVER(ORDER BY time) - time) as "Modbus",
  (LEAD(flow_enip_tcp) OVER(ORDER BY time) - flow_enip_tcp) / (LEAD(time) OVER(ORDER BY time) - time) as enip_tcp,
  (LEAD(flow_dnp3) OVER(ORDER BY time) - flow_dnp3) / (LEAD(time) OVER(ORDER BY time) - time) as dnp3,
  (LEAD(flow_nfs_tcp) OVER(ORDER BY time) - flow_nfs_tcp) / (LEAD(time) OVER(ORDER BY time) - time) as nfs_tcp,
  (LEAD(flow_ntp) OVER(ORDER BY time) - flow_ntp) / (LEAD(time) OVER(ORDER BY time) - time) as "NTP",
  (LEAD(flow_ftp_data) OVER(ORDER BY time) - flow_ftp_data) / (LEAD(time) OVER(ORDER BY time) - time) as "ftp-data",
  (LEAD(flow_tftp) OVER(ORDER BY time) - flow_tftp) / (LEAD(time) OVER(ORDER BY time) - time) as tftp,
  (LEAD(flow_ike) OVER(ORDER BY time) - flow_ike) / (LEAD(time) OVER(ORDER BY time) - time) as IKE,
  (LEAD(flow_krb5_tcp) OVER(ORDER BY time) - flow_krb5_tcp) / (LEAD(time) OVER(ORDER BY time) - time) as "KRB5 TCP",
  (LEAD(flow_quic) OVER(ORDER BY time) - flow_quic) / (LEAD(time) OVER(ORDER BY time) - time) as "QUIC",
  (LEAD(flow_dhcp) OVER(ORDER BY time) - flow_dhcp) / (LEAD(time) OVER(ORDER BY time) - time) as DHCP,
  (LEAD(flow_rfb) OVER(ORDER BY time) - flow_rfb) / (LEAD(time) OVER(ORDER BY time) - time) as RFB,
  (LEAD(flow_mqtt) OVER(ORDER BY time) - flow_mqtt) / (LEAD(time) OVER(ORDER BY time) - time) as MQTT,
  (LEAD(flow_pgsql) OVER(ORDER BY time) - flow_pgsql) / (LEAD(time) OVER(ORDER BY time) - time) as PostgreSQL,
  (LEAD(flow_telnet) OVER(ORDER BY time) - flow_telnet) / (LEAD(time) OVER(ORDER BY time) - time) as Telnet,
  (LEAD(flow_websocket) OVER(ORDER BY time) - flow_websocket) / (LEAD(time) OVER(ORDER BY time) - time) as WebSocket,
  (LEAD(flow_ldap_tcp) OVER(ORDER BY time) - flow_ldap_tcp) / (LEAD(time) OVER(ORDER BY time) - time) as "LDAP TCP",
  (LEAD(flow_doh2) OVER(ORDER BY time) - flow_doh2) / (LEAD(time) OVER(ORDER BY time) - time) as DoH2,
  (LEAD(flow_rdp) OVER(ORDER BY time) - flow_rdp) / (LEAD(time) OVER(ORDER BY time) - time) as RDP,
  (LEAD(flow_http2) OVER(ORDER BY time) - flow_http2) / (LEAD(time) OVER(ORDER BY time) - time) as "HTTP 2",
  (LEAD(flow_bittorrent_dht) OVER(ORDER BY time) - flow_bittorrent_dht) / (LEAD(time) OVER(ORDER BY time) - time) as "BitTorrent DHT",
  (LEAD(flow_pop3) OVER(ORDER BY time) - flow_pop3) / (LEAD(time) OVER(ORDER BY time) - time) as POP3,
  (LEAD(flow_mdns) OVER(ORDER BY time) - flow_mdns) / (LEAD(time) OVER(ORDER BY time) - time) as mDNS,
  (LEAD(flow_snmp) OVER(ORDER BY time) - flow_snmp) / (LEAD(time) OVER(ORDER BY time) - time) as SNMP,
  (LEAD(flow_failed_udp) OVER(ORDER BY time) - flow_failed_udp) / (LEAD(time) OVER(ORDER BY time) - time) as "Raw / Failed UDP",
  (LEAD(flow_dcerpc_udp) OVER(ORDER BY time) - flow_dcerpc_udp) / (LEAD(time) OVER(ORDER BY time) - time) as "DCERPC UDP",
  (LEAD(flow_dns_udp) OVER(ORDER BY time) - flow_dns_udp) / (LEAD(time) OVER(ORDER BY time) - time) as "DNS",
  (LEAD(flow_enip_udp) OVER(ORDER BY time) - flow_enip_udp) / (LEAD(time) OVER(ORDER BY time) - time) as "ENIP UDP",
  (LEAD(flow_nfs_udp) OVER(ORDER BY time) - flow_nfs_udp) / (LEAD(time) OVER(ORDER BY time) - time) as "NFS UDP",
  (LEAD(flow_krb5_udp) OVER(ORDER BY time) - flow_krb5_udp) / (LEAD(time) OVER(ORDER BY time) - time) as "KRB5 UDP",
  (LEAD(flow_ldap_udp) OVER(ORDER BY time) - flow_ldap_udp) / (LEAD(time) OVER(ORDER BY time) - time) as "LDAP UDP"
FROM (
  SELECT
    timestamp / 1000000 as time,
    extra_data->>"$.app_layer.flow.failed_tcp" as flow_failed_tcp,
    extra_data->>"$.app_layer.flow.http" as flow_http,
    extra_data->>"$.app_layer.flow.ftp" as flow_ftp,
    extra_data->>"$.app_layer.flow.smtp" as flow_smtp,
    extra_data->>"$.app_layer.flow.tls" as flow_tls,
    extra_data->>"$.app_layer.flow.ssh" as flow_ssh,
    extra_data->>"$.app_layer.flow.imap" as flow_imap,
    extra_data->>"$.app_layer.flow.smb" as flow_smb,
    extra_data->>"$.app_layer.flow.dcerpc_tcp" as flow_dcerpc_tcp,
    extra_data->>"$.app_layer.flow.dns_tcp" as flow_dns_tcp,
    extra_data->>"$.app_layer.flow.modbus" as flow_modbus,
    extra_data->>"$.app_layer.flow.enip_tcp" as flow_enip_tcp,
    extra_data->>"$.app_layer.flow.dnp3" as flow_dnp3,
    extra_data->>"$.app_layer.flow.nfs_tcp" as flow_nfs_tcp,
    extra_data->>"$.app_layer.flow.ntp" as flow_ntp,
    extra_data->>"$.app_layer.flow.ftp-data" as flow_ftp_data,
    extra_data->>"$.app_layer.flow.tftp" as flow_tftp,
    extra_data->>"$.app_layer.flow.ike" as flow_ike,
    extra_data->>"$.app_layer.flow.krb5_tcp" as flow_krb5_tcp,
    extra_data->>"$.app_layer.flow.quic" as flow_quic,
    extra_data->>"$.app_layer.flow.dhcp" as flow_dhcp,
    extra_data->>"$.app_layer.flow.rfb" as flow_rfb,
    extra_data->>"$.app_layer.flow.mqtt" as flow_mqtt,
    extra_data->>"$.app_layer.flow.pgsql" as flow_pgsql,
    extra_data->>"$.app_layer.flow.telnet" as flow_telnet,
    extra_data->>"$.app_layer.flow.websocket" as flow_websocket,
    extra_data->>"$.app_layer.flow.ldap_tcp" as flow_ldap_tcp,
    extra_data->>"$.app_layer.flow.doh2" as flow_doh2,
    extra_data->>"$.app_layer.flow.rdp" as flow_rdp,
    extra_data->>"$.app_layer.flow.http2" as flow_http2,
    extra_data->>"$.app_layer.flow.bittorrent-dht" as flow_bittorrent_dht,
    extra_data->>"$.app_layer.flow.pop3" as flow_pop3,
    extra_data->>"$.app_layer.flow.mdns" as flow_mdns,
    extra_data->>"$.app_layer.flow.snmp" as flow_snmp,
    extra_data->>"$.app_layer.flow.failed_udp" as flow_failed_udp,
    extra_data->>"$.app_layer.flow.dcerpc_udp" as flow_dcerpc_udp,
    extra_data->>"$.app_layer.flow.dns_udp" as flow_dns_udp,
    extra_data->>"$.app_layer.flow.enip_udp" as flow_enip_udp,
    extra_data->>"$.app_layer.flow.nfs_udp" as flow_nfs_udp,
    extra_data->>"$.app_layer.flow.krb5_udp" as flow_krb5_udp,
    extra_data->>"$.app_layer.flow.ldap_udp" as flow_ldap_udp
  FROM "other-event"
  WHERE
    event_type = "stats"
    AND time >= $__from / 1000 and time < $__to / 1000
)

targets.queryText:
SELECT
  time,
  (LEAD(tcp_syn) OVER(ORDER BY time) - tcp_syn) / (LEAD(time) OVER(ORDER BY time) - time) as SYN,
  (LEAD(tcp_synack) OVER(ORDER BY time) - tcp_synack) / (LEAD(time) OVER(ORDER BY time) - time) as SYNACK,
  (LEAD(tcp_rst) OVER(ORDER BY time) - tcp_rst) / (LEAD(time) OVER(ORDER BY time) - time) as RST,
  (LEAD(tcp_urg) OVER(ORDER BY time) - tcp_urg) / (LEAD(time) OVER(ORDER BY time) - time) as URG
FROM (
  SELECT
    timestamp / 1000000 as time,
    extra_data->>"$.tcp.syn" as tcp_syn,
    extra_data->>"$.tcp.synack" as tcp_synack,
    extra_data->>"$.tcp.rst" as tcp_rst,
    extra_data->>"$.tcp.urg" as tcp_urg
  FROM "other-event"
  WHERE
    event_type = "stats"
    AND time >= $__from / 1000 and time < $__to / 1000
)

SELECT
  time,
  (LEAD(wrk_spare_sync_avg) OVER(ORDER BY time) - wrk_spare_sync_avg) / (LEAD(time) OVER(ORDER BY time) - time) as spare_sync_avg,
  (LEAD(wrk_spare_sync) OVER(ORDER BY time) - wrk_spare_sync) / (LEAD(time) OVER(ORDER BY time) - time) as spare_sync,
  (LEAD(wrk_spare_sync_incomplete) OVER(ORDER BY time) - wrk_spare_sync_incomplete) / (LEAD(time) OVER(ORDER BY time) - time) as spare_sync_incomplete,
  (LEAD(wrk_spare_sync_empty) OVER(ORDER BY time) - wrk_spare_sync_empty) / (LEAD(time) OVER(ORDER BY time) - time) as spare_sync_empty,
  (LEAD(wrk_flows_evicted_needs_work) OVER(ORDER BY time) - wrk_flows_evicted_needs_work) / (LEAD(time) OVER(ORDER BY time) - time) as flows_evicted_needs_work,

  (LEAD(wrk_flows_evicted) OVER(ORDER BY time) - wrk_flows_evicted) / (LEAD(time) OVER(ORDER BY time) - time) as flows_evicted,
  (LEAD(wrk_flows_injected) OVER(ORDER BY time) - wrk_flows_injected) / (LEAD(time) OVER(ORDER BY time) - time) as flows_injected,
  (LEAD(wrk_flows_injected_max) OVER(ORDER BY time) - wrk_flows_injected_max) / (LEAD(time) OVER(ORDER BY time) - time) as flows_injected_max

SELECT
  time,
  (LEAD(tcp_ssn_memcap_drop) OVER(ORDER BY time) - tcp_ssn_memcap_drop) / (LEAD(time) OVER(ORDER BY time) - time) as "ssn_memcap_drop",
  (LEAD(tcp_invalid_checksum) OVER(ORDER BY time) - tcp_invalid_checksum) / (LEAD(time) OVER(ORDER BY time) - time) as "invalid_checksum",
  (LEAD(tcp_midstream_pickups) OVER(ORDER BY time) - tcp_midstream_pickups) / (LEAD(time) OVER(ORDER BY time) - time) as "midstream_pickups",
  (LEAD(tcp_pkt_on_wrong_thread) OVER(ORDER BY time) - tcp_pkt_on_wrong_thread) / (LEAD(time) OVER(ORDER BY time) - time) as "pkt_on_wrong_thread",
  (LEAD(tcp_ack_unseen_data) OVER(ORDER BY time) - tcp_ack_unseen_data) / (LEAD(time) OVER(ORDER BY time) - time) as "ack_unseen_data",
  (LEAD(tcp_segment_memcap_drop) OVER(ORDER BY time) - tcp_segment_memcap_drop) / (LEAD(time) OVER(ORDER BY time) - time) as "segment_memcap_drop",
  (LEAD(tcp_stream_depth_reached) OVER(ORDER BY time) - tcp_stream_depth_reached) / (LEAD(time) OVER(ORDER BY time) - time) as "stream_depth_reached",
  (LEAD(tcp_reassembly_gap) OVER(ORDER BY time) - tcp_reassembly_gap) / (LEAD(time) OVER(ORDER BY time) - time) as "reassembly_gap",
  (LEAD(tcp_overlap_diff_data) OVER(ORDER BY time) - tcp_overlap_diff_data) / (LEAD(time) OVER(ORDER BY time) - time) as "overlap_diff_data",
  (LEAD(tcp_insert_data_normal_fail) OVER(ORDER BY time) - tcp_insert_data_normal_fail) / (LEAD(time) OVER(ORDER BY time) - time) as "insert_data_normal_fail",
  (LEAD(tcp_insert_data_overlap_fail) OVER(ORDER BY time) - tcp_insert_data_overlap_fail) / (LEAD(time) OVER(ORDER BY time) - time) as "insert_data_overlap_fail",
  (LEAD(tcp_urgent_oob_data) OVER(ORDER BY time) - tcp_urgent_oob_data) / (LEAD(time) OVER(ORDER BY time) - time) as "urgent_oob_data"
FROM (
  SELECT
    timestamp / 1000000 as time,
    extra_data->>"$.tcp.ssn_memcap_drop" as tcp_ssn_memcap_drop,
    extra_data->>"$.tcp.invalid_checksum" as tcp_invalid_checksum,
    extra_data->>"$.tcp.midstream_pickups" as tcp_midstream_pickups,
    extra_data->>"$.tcp.pkt_on_wrong_thread" as tcp_pkt_on_wrong_thread,
    extra_data->>"$.tcp.ack_unseen_data" as tcp_ack_unseen_data,
    extra_data->>"$.tcp.segment_memcap_drop" as tcp_segment_memcap_drop,
    extra_data->>"$.tcp.stream_depth_reached" as tcp_stream_depth_reached,
    extra_data->>"$.tcp.reassembly_gap" as tcp_reassembly_gap,
    extra_data->>"$.tcp.overlap_diff_data" as tcp_overlap_diff_data,
    extra_data->>"$.tcp.insert_data_normal_fail" as tcp_insert_data_normal_fail,
    extra_data->>"$.tcp.insert_data_overlap_fail" as tcp_insert_data_overlap_fail,
    extra_data->>"$.tcp.urgent_oob_data" as tcp_urgent_oob_data
  FROM "other-event"
  WHERE
    event_type = "stats"
    AND time >= $__from / 1000 and time < $__to / 1000
)

SELECT
    time,
    (LEAD("failed_tcp.gap") OVER (ORDER BY time) - "failed_tcp.gap") / (LEAD(time) OVER(ORDER BY time) - time) as "failed_tcp_gap",
    (LEAD("http.gap") OVER (ORDER BY time) - "http.gap") / (LEAD(time) OVER(ORDER BY time) - time) as "http_gap",
